name: Personal Portfolio
description: My personal portfolio it’s a web application that utilizes React in the front end, and express as its back end.

name: Daichan
description: Static  website developed for a family owned Japanese restaurant. This site displays information about the restaurant, and surveys the customers’ favorite dishes using firebase.

name: Trivia Game
description: Trivia is a game which utilizes JavaScript for the logic and jQuery to manipulate the HTML.

name: Eat-Da-Burger
description: Eat-Da-Burger is a logger with MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars and a homemade ORM.

name: Jockey Express
description: Jockey Express is dynamic site that enables horse owners CRUD accessibility. This application was deployed through heroku, and utilizes JavaScript, Express, Sequelize, MySQL, HTML and CSS.

name: Bamazon
description: Bamazon is an Amazon-like storefront with a MySQL data based linked to it. The app takes in orders from customers and deplete stock from the store's inventory.

name: Clicky-Game
description: Clicky Game is a web app that utilizes React for the front end. It keeps a score of the user, and restarts the score when the user clicks on the image more than once.

name: Jockey Express V.2.0
description: This web application enables horse owners to oversee, access, update, view, modify and update a stable database. It allows the user to enter the sire, mare, gender, age, and picture of the horse of interest

name: NYT - React
description: This is a React-based NYT scraper. This web-application enables the user to save, erase, query and display articles based on user’s searches or articles of interest.
